comment: /**  * Look up a bean by the given name and return a corresponding instance for it.  * For attempting access to a factory bean, the name needs a <tt>&</tt> prefix.  * @param context the current evaluation context  * @param beanName the name of the bean to look up  * @return an object representing the bean  * @throws AccessException if there is an unexpected problem resolving the bean  */
code: /**  * Look up a bean by the given name and return a corresponding instance for it.  * For attempting access to a factory bean, the name needs a <tt>&</tt> prefix.  * @param context the current evaluation context  * @param beanName the name of the bean to look up  * @return an object representing the bean  * @throws AccessException if there is an unexpected problem resolving the bean  */ Object resolve(EvaluationContext context, String beanName) throws AccessException.
